action.content:
Infer the date from context.

Q: Today is Christmas Eve of 1937. What is the date 10 days ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 12/14/2026
(B) 12/14/1950
(C) 12/14/2007
(D) 12/14/1937
(E) 07/14/1938
(F) 12/14/1988
A: (D)

Q: Tomorrow is 11/12/2019. What is the date one year ago from today in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 09/04/2018
(B) 11/11/2018
(C) 08/25/2018
(D) 11/02/2018
(E) 11/04/2018
A: (B)

Q: Jane and John married on Jan 2, 1958. It is their 5-year anniversary today. What is the date tomorrow in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 01/11/1961
(B) 01/03/1963
(C) 01/18/1961
(D) 10/14/1960
(E) 01/03/1982
(F) 12/03/1960
A: (B)

Q: Today is the second day of the third month of 1966. What is the date 24 hours later in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 03/04/1966
(B) 04/03/1966
(C) 03/03/1965
(D) 03/03/2021
(E) 03/02/1966
(F) 03/03/1966
A:

action.content:
Q: The target grid has a full row of Xs at the top and a full row of Xs at the bottom. The second row has Xs in the first, third, and fifth columns, and the third row has Xs in the second and fourth columns. The fourth row has Xs in the first, second, and fourth columns. The only X in the middle row is in the fourth column. What is the pattern of Xs in the middle row?
Options:
(A) first, second, fourth, fifth
(B) first, second, fourth, fifth
(C) first, second, fourth, fifth
(D) first, second, fourth, fifth
Answer: (A) first, second, fourth, fifth||
action.label: response
